INDRVBY.original: ~r~Some of the gang members got away.
~r~Some of the gang members outside the garage got away.
INDRVBY.translated: ~r~车库外的一些帮派成员逃走了。

INDRVBY.original: ~r~Some of the gang members in the car got away.
INDRVBY.translated: ~r~车里的一些帮派成员逃走了。

INDRVBY.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_NEXT_WEAPON~ to select different weapons to perform a vehicle attack with.
INDRVBY.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_VEH_NEXT_WEAPON~切换从载具中攻击时所用的武器。

INDRVBY.original: ~s~To fire your weapon from a vehicle, hold ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~.
INDRVBY.translated: ~s~按住~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~以在载具中用武器攻击。

INDRVBY.original: ~s~Go and get a ~b~car~s~ to be used in the attack.
INDRVBY.translated: ~s~去弄一辆用于进行攻击的~b~车。~s~

INDRVBY.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_VEH_HEADLIGHT~ to select different weapons to perform a vehicle attack with.
INDRVBY.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_VEH_HEADLIGHT~切换从载具中攻击时所用的武器。

INDRVBY.original: ~s~If you are in a vehicle and have an appropriate weapon you can fire it.
INDRVBY.translated: ~s~在载具中时，若你拥有合适的武器，即可用其进行攻击。

INDRVBY.original: ~S~They are trying to escape in a ~r~car,~s~ don't let them get away.
INDRVBY.translated: ~S~他们想要~r~驾车~s~逃跑，别让他们跑了。
